---
title: ggplot issue
format: html
---

# Setup

R version: 4.3.3
ggplot2 version: main (or latest CRAN)


```{r}
library(ggplot2)

data <- readr::read_csv('./data/example.csv')
```

# Demo

```{r}
for (i in 1:100) {
  p <- data |>
    ggplot() +
    aes(x, y) +
    facet_grid(facet_a ~  facet_b)
  print(p)
}
```
